## ShaderSpec.declPrefixes property

Variable naming convention variable prefixes for GLSL code gen.

Defaults:

- Attributes: `a_` - Varying: `v_` - Uniforms: `u_` - Outputs: `o_`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declPrefixes?: Partial<GLSLDeclPrefixes>;
```
